attributes.action: Start a full investigation into child grooming gangs(rape gangs)
attributes.additional_details: to bring justice to the thousands of girls that were raped and abused
attributes.background: I believe that the public deserve a full investigation into all child grooming/rape gangs which in no way should affect bringing in the new child protection laws as they can both be impeded at the same time

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
